Performance:
November 1970: The Nunobiki Waterfall

Production: November 1970

Play: The Nunobiki Waterfall (源平布引滝)

Scenes:

The Imperial Palace (大内 / Ōuchi)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (布引滝 / Nunobiki-no taki)

Yosikata's Mansion (義賢館 / Yoshikata yakata)

Yabase Bay (矢橋 / Yabase)

The Return from Chikubu Island (竹生島遊覧 / Chikubushima yūran)

Kurosuke's House (九郎助内 / Kurosuke uchi)

The Otowa Hill (音羽山 / Otowayama)

The Biwa Music (松波琵琶 / Matsunami biwa)

The Maple Hill (紅葉山 / Momijiyama)

Characters:

Naritada, a court noble (Dainagon Naritada / 大納言成忠)

Suemune, a Heike clansman (Osadano Tarō Suemune / 長田太郎末宗)

Yoshikata, a Genji general (Kisono Senjō Yoshikata / 木曾先生義賢)

Emperor Goshirakawa (Goshirakawa Tennō / 後白河天皇)

Kiyomori, Head of the Heike clan (Akinokami Tairano Kiyomori / 安芸守平清盛)

Tsunetoshi, a Heike clansman (Nanbano Rokurō Tsunetoshi / 難波六郎常俊)

Shigemori, Son of Kiyomori (Tairano Shigemori (Komatsuno Naifu Shigemori) / 平重盛 (小松内府重盛))

Nagatsune (Takahashi Hangan Nagatsune / 高橋判官長常)

Yukitsuna, a Genji warrior (Tadano Kurando Yukitsuna / 多田蔵人行綱)

Aoi-Gozen, Yoshikata's wife (Aoi Gozen / 葵御前)

Matsuyoi, Yoshikata's daughter (Matsuyoi Hime / 待宵姫)

Kurosuke, a farmer (Hyakushō Kurosuke / 百姓九郎助)

Koman, Kurosuke's daughter (Nyōbō Koman / 女房小まん)

Tarokichi, Koman's son (Segare Tarokichi / 伜太郎吉)

Munemasa, a Heike warrior (Shinno Jirō Munemasa / 進野次郎宗政)

Heinai, Munemasa's retainer (Yokota Hyōnai (Heinai) / 横田平内)

Gunzo, Munemasa's retainer (Gunzō / 軍蔵)

Chuta, a Heike warrior (Shiomino Chūta / 塩見忠太)

Munemori, Son of Shigemori (Tairano Munemori / 平宗盛)

Saemon, a Heike general (Hidano Saemon / 飛騨左衛門)

Sanemori, a Heike general (Saitō Sanemori / 斎藤実盛)

Koyoshi, Kurosuke's wife (Kurosuke Nyōbō Koyoshi / 九郎助女房小よし)

Nisota, Kurosuke's nephew (Yabaseno Nisōta / 矢橋二惣太)

Seno-o, a Heike warrior (Senō Jūrō / 瀬尾十郎)

Village headman (Shōya / 庄屋)

Matsunami Kengyo (Matsunami Kengyō / 松波検校)

Reisui, a highway robber (Tanigawa Reisui / 谷川冷水)

Kozakura, Yukitsuna's daughter (Musume Kozakura / 娘小桜)

Wakaba, a lady-in-waiting (Wakabano tsubone / 若葉局)

Momiji, a lady-in-waiting (Momijino tsubone / 紅葉局)

Moritsugu, a Heike clansman (Etchu Jiro) (Ecchū Jirō Moritsugu / 越中次郎盛次)

Tadamitsu, a Heike clansman (Kazusa Goro) (Kazusa Gōrō Tadamitsu / 上総五郎忠光)

Boatman (Sendō / 船頭)
